vote.title: Authorize (1) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $2,265,563.40 in the Wastewater Construction Fund; (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $2,221,321.60 in the Water Construction Fund; and (3) a construction services contract for water and wastewater main improvements at 24 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Camino Construction, LP, lowest responsible bidder of seven - Not to exceed $14,476,723.00 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($2,112,358.40 $2,265,563.40), Water Construction Fund ($2,221,321.60), Wastewater Construction Fund ($153,205.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($2,427,562.77), Water (Drinking Water) - TWDB 2020 Fund ($3,305,811.07), Water (Drinking Water) - TWDB 2022 Fund ($1,018,288.78), Wastewater (Clean Water) - TWDB 2020 Fund ($3,238,175.38)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $2,265,563.40 in the Wastewater Construction Fund; (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $2,221,321.60 in the Water Construction Fund; and (3) a construction services contract for water and wastewater main improvements at 24 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Camino Construction, LP, lowest responsible bidder of seven - Not to exceed $14,476,723.00 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($2,112,358.40 $2,265,563.40), Water Construction Fund ($2,221,321.60), Wastewater Construction Fund ($153,205.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($2,427,562.77), Water (Drinking Water) - TWDB 2020 Fund ($3,305,811.07), Water (Drinking Water) - TWDB 2022 Fund ($1,018,288.78), Wastewater (Clean Water) - TWDB 2020 Fund ($3,238,175.38)
